title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 2009/88 of 7 July 1988 amending Regulation (EEC) No 2681/83 laying down detailed rules for the application of the subsidy system for oil seeds
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 2009/88
of 7 July 1988
amending Regulation (EEC) No 2681/83 laying down detailed rules for the application of the subsidy system for oil seeds
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Regulation (EEC) No 2681/83 is hereby amended as follows:
1. The second subparagraph of Article 2 (4) is replaced by the following:
'However, for the 1986/87 to 1989/90 marketing years, Âťdouble zero" rape seed shall be allowed to contain a level of glucosinolates not exceeding 35 micromoles per gram of seed.'
2. In the second subparagraph of Article 32, 'marketing years 1986/87 and 1987/88' is replaced by '1986/87 to 1988/89 marketing years'.
3. The third subparagraph of Article 32 is deleted.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day of its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall apply with effect from 1 July 1988.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 7 July 1988.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
